title: Inflection points from second derivative function

content.prompt: Let f be a function with a second derivative given by \(f"\left(x\right)=x^2\left(x-3\right)\left(x-6\right)\). What are the x-coordinates of the points of inflection of the graph of f ?

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
